address: piazza Petrini 1, località Canezza di Pergine
description: The scent of woodsmoke and the cheerful open fire that greet you at this authentic mountain inn tell you all you need to know about the place. The menu features top-quality seasonal ingredients, including delicious maize gnocchi with a ragù made from local game, while the service is friendly and attentive.
